metadata.name: Bitcoin Ordinal Elilustrador #1/462
metadata.description:
There are only 462 pieces of Ordinal prepared.  
Please let us know when your Ordinal wallet is ready.

We can build an early btcnft community.  
All pieces are now securely inscribed on the Bitcoin blockchain. Inscription order is based on your ERC-721 token ID. You will be able to view your counterparty Ordinal sitting safely in a Bitcoin wallet made specifically for each token on the dashboard, and once proper infrastructure for Ordinals is available that is user-friendly, you will be able to burn your ETH token for a BTC Ordinal
